ygData.subject: Re: Anti-charming
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyways i know i am going to change the subject now,,,,,,ok I am a baker at 82 skill points in it not bad but not good,,, Ok i put 1 points in pottery now i
ygData.messageBody:
Anyways i know i am going to change the subject now,,,,,,ok I am a baker at
82 skill points in it not bad but not good,,,

Ok i put 1 points in pottery now i want to make some stuff,,here is just 1
example of what i did,

1 flask of water
1 pie tin sketch
2 small blocks of clay
ok i out it in the pottery wheel and you know what i got?It said that combo
was not right,you know i read my book and the book says that is howyou do
it.Can anyone here help me out?

Lanoche(karana)magician intelligence of 140
----- Original Message -----
From: Enigma enigma+AEA-door.net
To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Sent: Friday, July 23, 1999 11:25 AM
Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Anti-charming


From: +ACI-Enigma+ACI- enigma+AEA-door.net

Same applies for being Feared.


Xakthan
Lord of Shadows
Follower of the Crimson Knights

--- Enigma ---
http://members.door.net/enigma

-----Original Message-----
From: dlobdell +AFs-mailto:dlobdell+AEA-stny.lrun.com+AF0-
Sent: Thursday, July 22, 1999 10:03 AM
To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Subject: Re: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Anti-charming

From: +ACI-dlobdell+ACI- dlobdell+AEA-stny.lrun.com

Your theory is correct, when in a battle, if a person in your party is
charmed, he will NOT get xp for anything killed during the duration of the
charm...

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-The certain proof that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the
universe
is that no one has bothered to make contact with us.+ACI-

-----Original Message-----
From: Fling, Kirby FlingKirby+AEA-GACNW.com
To: 'EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com' EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 4:55 PM
Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Anti-charming


From: +ACI-Fling, Kirby+ACI- FlingKirby+AEA-GACNW.com

On a related note: On that foray against the evil eye.... The other 5
people all got charmed in our group... they started attacking while I
was
AFK, so I got there halfway through the battle. I unloaded all my manna
at
the eye and successfully killed it. I got an experience message, but
nobody
else in the group did. My current theory is that once you are charmed,
you
count as a monster, and won't get the experience message for any group
kills
during that time. Unfortunately, this is also hard to test.
Unfortunately
that mishap resulted in the death of more than half our party... but when
I
looked at my XP-o-meter, I got a huge chunk of XP from the fight (if my
theory is correct, I got all of the XP)

-Kzak


-----Original Message-----
When fighting evil eyes in the gorge the other night, I hit the sit
button
while charmed somehow. The result was canceling the charm, which allowed
me
to continue with my battle. I managed to do this repeatedly throughout
the
night. This could be a coincidence or an actual bug in the game, I'm not
sure. Since I felt it was cheating, I quit doing it and left the gorge+ADs-
after all, I only wanted another Polished Bone Bracer +ADs-)
